title: Inspections
context: ยง386-97 Inspections. The director of labor and industrial relations may inspect the plants and establishments of all employers in the State and the inspectors designated by the director shall have free access to such premises during regular working hours, and at other reasonable times. [L 1963, c 116, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง97-112; HRS ยง386-97]
